under_analysis.subject: Your order is under analysis
under_analysis.first_paragraph: Your order on the scholl {{school_name}} is under payment analysis.
under_analysis.second_paragraph: Do not worry, your payment confirmation is automatically realized by our payment mediator. As soon the payment be confirmed you will receive a new email with course release.

boleto_created.subject: Your bankin billet was generated!
boleto_created.first_paragraph: Your ordered on the school {{school_name}} was confirmed and the banking billet will be generate on the purchase.
boleto_created.second_paragraph: Attention: The banking billet debt can take up to three days before payment. Confirmation and release of the content will be automatically, however can take some time untill it conclude.
boleto_created.third_paragraph: Click here to print the banking billet again.

confirmed.subject: Your order was approved!
confirmed.first_paragraph: Your order on the school {{school_name}} was approved! ✅
confirmed.second_paragraph: Now is just access and watch the courses.

failed.subject: Your order can not be completed
failed.first_paragraph: Unfortunatelly your order on the school {{school_name}} can not be completed. ❌
failed.second_paragraph: This may occur for some reasons, as a security fail found or insuficient amount on the credit card. We suggest you to try again with another payment condition.
